sqlMap.select: SELECT GOODS_ID, GOODS_NM, PRICE, GOODS_IMAGE_ID FROM RTETNGOODS WHERE GOODS_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') AND USE_AT = '1' ORDER BY GOODS_ID DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE RTETNGOODS SET GOODS_ID = #goodsId# ,GOODS_NM = #goodsNm# ,PRICE = #price# ,CTGRY_ID = #categoryVO.ctgryId# ,GOODS_IMAGE_ID = #goodsImageVO.goodsImageId# ,DETAIL_INFO_IMAGE_ID = #detailImageVO.goodsImageId# ,MAKR = #makr# WHERE GOODS_ID = #goodsId#
UPDATE RTETNGOODSIMAGE SET GOODS_IMAGE_ID = #goodsImageId# ,FILE_NM = #fileNm# WHERE GOODS_IMAGE_ID = #goodsImageId#
UPDATE RTETNGOODS SET USE_AT='0', CTGRY_ID='CATEGORY-00000000000' WHERE GOODS_ID = #goodsId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.GOODS_ID, A.GOODS_NM, A.PRICE, A.CTGRY_ID, B.GOODS_IMAGE_ID, C.GOODS_IMAGE_ID AS DETAIL_INFO_IMAGE_ID, A.MAKR, B.FILE_NM, C.FILE_NM AS DETAIL_FILE_NM, D.CTGRY_NM, A.USE_AT FROM RTETNGOODS A, RTETNGOODSIMAGE B, RTETNGOODSIMAGE C, RTETNCTGRY D WHERE GOODS_ID = #goodsId# AND A.GOODS_IMAGE_ID = B.GOODS_IMAGE_ID AND A.DETAIL_INFO_IMAGE_ID = C.GOODS_IMAGE_ID AND A.CTGRY_ID = D.CTGRY_ID
SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM RTETNGOODS WHERE GOODS_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') AND USE_AT = '1'

SELECT G.GOODS_ID, G.GOODS_NM, G.PRICE, G.GOODS_IMAGE_ID, G.MAKR, C.CTGRY_ID, C.CTGRY_NM, I.GOODS_IMAGE_ID, I.FILE_NM, D.GOODS_IMAGE_ID DETAIL_INFO_IMAGE_ID, D.FILE_NM detail_file_nm, G.USE_AT FROM RTETNGOODS G, RTETNCTGRY C, RTETNGOODSIMAGE I, RTETNGOODSIMAGE D WHERE G.CTGRY_ID = C.CTGRY_ID AND G.GOODS_IMAGE_ID=I.GOODS_IMAGE_ID AND G.DETAIL_INFO_IMAGE_ID=D.GOODS_IMAGE_ID AND G.USE_AT='1' ORDER BY GOODS_ID DESC
